channel.description: Add a sign-in with Okta Verify Click here to give feedback about this page Content Notes Target personas: WIC App Developer,Experienced IAM developer Changes to be made: Update title Links to original docs: - Configure Direct Authentication grant types: https://developer.okta.com/docs/guides/configure-direct-auth-grants/dmfaoobov/main/ Structure type: Task Content type: How-to with code A “How-to with code” illustrates how to perform a specific task that involves writing code. The focus is geared towards developers integrating an SDK, API, or another library into their applications.
